author: PlayStation
description:
Video description:
The Conductor has breached the heart of the Vanguard’s power.

Return to the Plaguelands, secure powerful Golden Age salvage, and defend Earth in the new Reclaim activity.

Major Update: Ash and Iron // September 9, 2025

⠀ ⠀ ⠀ ⠀
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other
title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate - Ash & Iron Major Update Trailer | PS5, PS4 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4133-PPSA04452_00-SPACEMARINESII00

Today’s Anniversary Update brings two new game modes, new maps for the Operations and Eternal War modes, weapons, enemies and more!

Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive are excited to announce the release of the Anniversary Update for their blockbuster third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. The gameplay update is available free for all PlayStation 5 players. Today’s kick-off of Year 2 also marks the release of the game’s Season Pass II, promising new Chapter-inspired cosmetics. 

Check out our Anniversary Update Trailer!

#ps5 #ps5games #warhammer40k #spacemarine2 

Rated Mature
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Anniversary Update | PS5 Games

Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive are thrilled to announce the release of SnowRunner’s fourth expansion “Season 16: High Voltage”, taking players to Washington, USA! Available now on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5, this 16th season also marks the end of the Year 4 Pass, and the release of the Year 5 Pass!

Check out the Season 16 Overview Trailer!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #snowrunner
title: SnowRunner - Season 16 Overview | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014205

Void Crew is a 1-6 player co-op First Person Space Adventure: Rally your crew, power your spaceship, and get ready for epic space battles, facing chaotic dangers you and your crew never trained for!
Pilot the ship, man the turrets, perform emergency repairs, recharge the power cells, utilize space station weaponry, fabricate munitions and exit the ship on extravehicular missions - be it patching the ship hull or scavenging derelict wrecks.

After a successful launch on PC, the chaotic co-op space adventure where you explore, fight and scavenge loot across the galaxy with your crewmates is coming to PlayStation 5 today!

#ps5 #ps5games #voidcrew
title: Void Crew - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
